com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query

Class FulltextSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.FulltextSearch

  • public class FulltextSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to prepare a full text search query.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FulltextSearch andChildrenSearch(DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
      Sets the full text search to use the same text search in the nested documents, returning just the parents matching the search and containing a children which matches de search.
      FulltextSearch andChildrenSearch(FulltextSearch childrenSearch, DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
      Sets the full text search to use the an specific text search in the nested documents, returning just the parents matching the parent search containing children which matches the children search.

      • text

        public FulltextSearch text(java.lang.String fullText)
        Sets the text for fulltext search query to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        fullText - String text to be searched for.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the new text query.

      • context

        public FulltextSearch context(java.lang.String context)
        Sets the search context for fulltext search.
        Parameters:
        context - String context to be searched in.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the new context.

      • orChildrenSearch

        public FulltextSearch orChildrenSearch(DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
        Sets the full text search to use the same text search in the nested documents, returning also the parents containing a children which matches the search.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the the deepSearch enabled.

      • orChildrenSearch

        public FulltextSearch orChildrenSearch(FulltextSearch childrenSearch,
                                       DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
        Sets the full text search to use the an specific text search in the nested documents, returning also the parents containing a children which matches the children search search. Even if the parent does not mach the original search.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the the deepSearch enabled.

      • andChildrenSearch

        public FulltextSearch andChildrenSearch(DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
        Sets the full text search to use the same text search in the nested documents, returning just the parents matching the search and containing a children which matches de search.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the the deepSearch enabled.

      • andChildrenSearch

        public FulltextSearch andChildrenSearch(FulltextSearch childrenSearch,
                                        DocumentFactory childrenFactory)
        Sets the full text search to use the an specific text search in the nested documents, returning just the parents matching the parent search containing children which matches the children search.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the the deepSearch enabled.

      • filter

        public FulltextSearch filter(java.lang.String field,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Adds a basic Filter.TermFilter to the search query.
        Parameters:
        field - String name of the field to filter by.
        value - String value to filter.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with the new filter added.

      • clearFilter

        public FulltextSearch clearFilter()
        Removes all the filters of the fulltext search query.
        Returns:

        public FulltextSearch sort(java.lang.String field,
                           Sort.Direction direction)
        Add a basic Sort.SimpleSort to the fulltext search query.
        Parameters:

        direction - Sort.Direction indicating the sorting order.
        Returns:

      • page

        public FulltextSearch page(int page,
                           int size)
        Set the page to be returned from the fulltext search query results.
        Parameters:
        page - int number of page.
        size - int number of results to get in every page.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with page configured.

      • page

        public FulltextSearch page(int page)
        Set the page to be returned from the fulltext search query results. The number of results is read from the config file if existing, if not, by default is 10.
        Parameters:
        page - int number of page.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with page configured.

      • page

        public FulltextSearch page(Page page)
        Set the page to be returned from the fulltext search query results.
        Parameters:
        page - Page object indicating the page to retrieve from query.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with page configured.

      • slice

        public FulltextSearch slice(int offset,
                            int size)
        Set the slice to be returned from the fulltext search query results.
        Parameters:
        offset - int index number of the result to start from.
        size - int number of results to get from the offset.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with slice configured.

      • slice

        public FulltextSearch slice(int offset)
        Set the slice to be returned from the fulltext search query results. The number of results is read from the config file if existing, if not, by default is 10.
        Parameters:
        offset - int index number of the result to start from.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with page configured.

        Set the page to be returned from the fulltext search query results.
        Parameters:
        slice - Slice object indicating the slice of results to retrieve from query.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch instance with page configured.

      • setStrict

        public FulltextSearch setStrict(boolean strict)
        Changes the Fulltext search strict flag. If set to true a RuntimeException will be thrown when trying to do a nested document search filtering by parent fields in the nested documents or the other way around.
        Parameters:
        strict - boolean value to activate or deactivate the strict search.
        Returns:
        This FulltextSearch object with the strict flag changes.

      • getStrict

        public boolean getStrict()
        Get the value of the flag strict for this FulltextSearch object.
        Returns:
        the boolean value of strict.
